intro: Psychotria milnei, commonly known as the "Purple Psychotria," is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, fragrant white or purple flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. Psychotria milnei is also noted for its use in traditional medicine by indigenous communities.
